r.s: Class for parsing and handling URL.
r.d: Provides parsing of URLs into their constituent parts (scheme, host, path etc.), URL generation, and resolving of relative URLs.
r.n: * BC break: Removed setOption() to avoid undefined behaviour (bug #16674) * Fixed Bug #16854: Invalid package.xml making it impossible to install with Pyrus * Fixed Bug #16651: Port may be an empty string * Fixed Bug #16653: Don't make OPTION_SEPARATOR_(IN|OUT)PUT default to arg_separator.(in|out)put
